requirements: Power BI 2.87.261.0 or greater. Access to the Power BI template requires a Power BI license via a Health Catalyst ticket. Access to the Power BI download file requires an Azure DevOps basic license from Health Catalyst.
notes: Sub-navbar includes static population metrics and other info that had been in the filters pane
On-page hidden filters removed to take advantage of the built-in filtering experience Power BI provides
Tool-tips, charts, tables, and other objects align fonts, colors, pop-up styles
